hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.swing

Class ObservableItemListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util.DefaultObservable<ItemEvent>
      • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.swing.ObservableItemListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseObserver, CloseableObservable<ItemEvent>, Observable<ItemEvent>, Observer<ItemEvent>, Subject<ItemEvent,ItemEvent>, ItemListener, Closeable, AutoCloseable, EventListener

    public class ObservableItemListener
extends DefaultObservable<ItemEvent>
implements ItemListener
    The observable item listener which relays events from ItemListener. This observable never signals finish() or error().
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.02.01.
